website_summaries.verdict: A fashionable backpack that stands out in a crowd.
pros: Large main compartment for books, binders and extra files
Variety of pockets and sleeves make it ideal for school or travel use
cons: Rated for 17" laptops but is better suited for 15" and smaller

customer_reviews.title: Can't Wait to Use It
customer_reviews.text: This beauty arrived yesterday. I noticed many reviews mentioned the buttons - either that they were fabric or that they came off. Mine are metal and they seem to be sewn on securely. If they come off, I'll just stitch back on. This pack seems to be well made. It has LOTS of good padding and the inside polka dot lining is adorable. I was looking for something strong and protective, yet feminine and this seems to fit the bill. The external fabric has a nice look/feel, the zippers seem strong and there are pockets-o-plenty! I will update the review if something changes, but I cannot wait to use it! PS - The cobalt blue color is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Beth S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a college graduate student
customer_reviews.text: Just right! Doesn't hurt my shoulders and seems to somehow compliment everything I wear. Perfect for a college graduate student.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made to Last
customer_reviews.text: I bought myself a yellow one when I went to grad school 3 years ago. My highschooler wanted to use it, but I couldn't give mine up. So I got her this blue one. She didn't even ask for a new backpack this year, and it still looks great. She will probably use it next year too. None of the other backpack companies had something that lasted 2 years. Worth the price. My only negative - this is a smaller size, so, it doesn't hold everything if you like to be prepared when going out for a long day, this might not do it for you. Your back will thank you, though.
customer_reviews.author: T.J. Teacher

customer_reviews.title: They thought of everything in this bag.
customer_reviews.text: This bag has exceeded all my expectations. The first thing that struck me was how comfortable the straps were. Apparently, they are 'women-specific shoulder straps'. Who knew there was such a thing? The colour is vibrant and the design is stylish. As an elementary teacher by day and a Master's student by night, I need a lot of storage. This bag delivers! It has a million and one compartments which really help to keep me organised. I could go on and on but will sum up this bag by saying that 'they really thought of everything'.
customer_reviews.author: Serita

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, looks new after months of use! Perfectly organized. Everything I need fits inside for a 48-hour trip to visit a client — no need to wheel in a suitcase to my client’s conference room anymore! UPDATE: still looks like new except one of the buttons popped off. I still have it will try to see if a shoe repair person might be able to fix it. It’s on a small petal piece.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin D. Amundgaard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel companion
customer_reviews.text: I travel quite a bit for work and needed a backpack that would fit my laptop, tablet, chargers and other assorted travel stuff (pen, books, notepads, wallet) without being overstuffed - and which would fit under the seat back in front of me in a plane. This fits the bill. Everything goes inside, it’s lightweight and roomy. Stores easily in planes. And holds a water bottle. It’s cute (I bought blue/purple) and the material is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Gina T

customer_reviews.title: Slim, organized and stylish
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is perfect for my petite frame. It's very well constructed and durable so far, and has ample storage and organization. I think the front pocket is quite useful for quickly tossing in my phone or a charger, etc. Having tried many backpacks, I think this one is of high quality. In fact, it's the best backpack I've ever had for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Traveling Dog-Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, horrible straps.
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for me at all. I'm not large by any means, I am 5'6", 115 lbs, and female. This backpack was great for weight distribution (fully loaded with textbooks and notebooks, pens, pencils, calculator, other college stuff), as it still felt light. This issue with it is how close together the straps are. They pressed right down on the most painful part of my neck, and I couldn't handle having this on for more than a few minutes at a time, and walking just wasn't working for me. It is adorable, and the inside is great! Tons of storage, great compartments, and tons of storage and organization. I just wish the straps were better placed.

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in June 2013 and I travel ALL the time with it. It fits my laptop, laptop tray, ipad, cords, planner, snacks, camera and more in there. It still looks as good as it did when I bought it too. Zippers all still function perfectly, interior pockets are secure and it's comfortable to carry even when it's packed full because the straps are nicely padded. It's a great size for me and I'm 5'2". It doesn't dwarf me. It fits comfortably on my back. I completely love it, and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Eat Move Make

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Great back pack! Not too small, but not overly big either. I can fit my 15” MacBook Pro in it to give you some reference. I’ve had it for about 8 months now and it’s still in great condition, hasn’t ripped or fallen apart and I put a lot of stuff in it. It’s also stylish, I’ve gotten several compliments from people. I also appreciate the thick padding on the straps and on the back of the back pack!
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: This is a BEAUTIFUL bag! I get so many compliments
customer_reviews.text: This is a BEAUTIFUL bag! I get so many compliments, and the straps have a foam that makes it so comfortable to wear, even with my heavy laptop in it. My last Ogio bag was one with a similar look, but it was red and a messenger back. I still got compliments on it at the end of the 11ish years I had it. They keep their color, and they always look so good and weather and age well.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Buttons Fall Off Easily
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this backpack. I have a more expensive one that had a nicer felt lining on the inside, but that's not necessary. The pockets make it easy to load/store stuff and there's a little removable foam piece on the bottom of the laptop section for larger laptops. I stopped using this backpack though because the two lower buttons have fallen off. I bought this back in April and it looks weird without the buttons. I've passed the return window. If I can figure out how to attach new buttons, I might just do that and use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great storage and organization
customer_reviews.text: Great storage and organization. I've recommended this to a few people. It's very cute and the design is nice enough for an adult woman to carry without making her look like a college student. Great functionality in the interior pockets. My only wish is that the outside water bottle pockets were elastic- if you have the inside full, they don't stretch out to accommodate a water bottle so you lose that space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite backpack ever!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this backpack. I mostly use it when I travel onsite for work and it’s the perfect size and looks cute but professional enough. Very durable with comfy straps. It’s great for your laptop and has good sized pockets for all sizes of storage and they are easy to get at quickly. I get compliments on it every time I wear it. Would also work great for students of all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Dursteler

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter so her bag wouldn’t get mixed up with all the North Face ones her friends have. Very well made, holds her laptop, books, and smaller things like pencil bag and planner. And it’s just really stinkin cute!
customer_reviews.author: luckymama

customer_reviews.title: Such a great find/buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a Vera Bradley back pack that I used for work but because it was fabric the bottom wore through! I had previously gotten a purse from OGIO and like the sturdy material so I searched for a backpack and viola! This cute one popped up! Material is awesome, there are cute little polka dots and lots of organization! IF this ever wears out I’ll be back for another one for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Deester

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this backpack almost every day for three years. I just came back to the description to check if it's machine-washable, and thought I should write a review because it has held up so well. It doesn't even look dirty, I just decided that after 3 years, and being put on the ground in numerous coffee shops and on the NYC subway, I should wash it! It's great if you want a backpack that can store your laptop, lunch, and maybe a couple books, without looking like you're setting off on a hike. It's not huge—I used to bring a separate gym bag around—but it does the job great for the size.
customer_reviews.author: GabrielleMeroe

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, well made, but limited by size and design
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality backpack with stylish interior and exterior. I use this backpack for commuting back and forth to work and school. The organizer compartment has a place for everything. I don't even carry a purse anymore - just a wallet. I fits a macbook pro with full cable, an ipad air, a 2" binder, supplies in the organizer, sunglasses, umbrella and wallet - but not much else. The biggest disappointment with the pack is the side pockets do not have any elastic; therefore, when the pack is full, they are too tight to put a water bottle in them. You must borrow space from inside the pack to use them.
customer_reviews.author: C. Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Not practical for traveling
customer_reviews.text: The buttons will separate from its base if knocked or something rubs against it. Once that happens, the outer flap gapes open. Also, if you pack heavier stuff in the front, the zippers will unzip and the pack will open, spilling the contents everywhere. It's cute, but not practical for traveling. It fell apart on one trip by air due to being slid around through TSA and being stowed during flight.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag for my work laptop. Used to use an over the shoulder bag (OGIO brand) but it broke and started bothering my neck so I went to this style. Great decision! Very comfortable and even though my laptop is a dinosaur and weighs a lot, I don't notice it. Love all the compartments!
customer_reviews.author: sliver1081

customer_reviews.title: Awesome except that it doesn't stand up
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, love all the pockets! Very well-thought-out design, as with my other OGIO bag, with one exception: you can't put this backpack down without it falling over. Doesn't stand up even a little. Annoying to always have to find something to lean it against. Add a flat bottom panel and this backpack would get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit a 15.6" laptop
customer_reviews.text: Attractive enough of a bag, but I am beyond annoyed that I ordered this for my 15.6" laptop and it doesn't fit. Despite the product description clearly states it will hold up to a 17" laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super nice backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and design....well thought out. Love the soft bumper in the bottom allows the pack to rest comfortably on my back. Holds enough clothes, shoes and personal items to use as an overnight bag. Plan to take it to Europein this spring really nice color
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am really thankful to amazon and the backpack's company for making my job easier. I am a dedicated, very organized high school math teacher. This backpack is perfect: my laptop, papers, folders, and everything else I need to carry fits in an organized way. I love the different compartments. I dress up professionally. Because of this I was always hesitant about using a backpack. But the gray/black combination is perfect. Everything is perfect about this bag. That is why I felt it deserved my time to write a review.
customer_reviews.author: sonia

customer_reviews.title: Functional and professional, great pack.
customer_reviews.text: I love this pack. It is just the right size - fits a laptop and cord, notebook/papers, and a front pocket for personal items. Sleek, and professional looking. I have always used more outdoors looking packs, more interested in function than style. Decided to switch to this, and love it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Small and sleek
customer_reviews.text: Small backpack that fits my large laptop. It barely fits but I’m making it work. Still works and holds up great after months of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: B. Tamarin

customer_reviews.title: Using as an engineering student- pretty decent so far
customer_reviews.text: I'm an engineering student so I usuallly always have my laptop with me along with many heavy textbooks. Amount of padding is great for my laptop. Both zippers of the main pocket broke on my last backpack so I really like the smoothness of the zippers on this bag. My laptop(15" toshiba) just barely fits in there (but it does fit) and I can also fit in a decent amount of notebooks, folders, my pencil bag, charger, wallet, keys, and a small textbook. Not as big as I would normally need as it wouldn't be able to fit any of my binder sized textbooks but is of great quality so far!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and professional look. I love this Laptop Backpack. The straps are padded to help offset your heavy load. I can carry my mini laptop and 3 large college books in my bag. I use this for both the office and school - it goes everywhere with me. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: I love Ogio bags
customer_reviews.text: I love Ogio bags. I have a cross body one and love it. It's so cute and functional and the color is perfect. This backpack is also cute and functional but way too big for what I was looking for and too many pockets- one for a laptop and I don't travel with a laptop. I was just envisioning something a little different. It's actually a perfect backpack for laptop carriers. If I had a laptop to drag around I would use this. It's a really cute bag! I really wanted one with polka dot inner lining, this one has chevron.
customer_reviews.author: Kim & Jeff Crouch

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new MacBook Air and am completely in love with it! I need a laptop backpack that would be good for travel, that was good quality and also had lots of space. This is exactly what I was looking for. So many pockets to organize, and plenty of room for traveling as well. I also love the front pocket with the button detail. Order this backpack! You will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: J M A

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is amazing! I bought it to get away from a shoulder computer bag and this is so great! I can fit everything and more in it. I also used it to fly recently and it was great as my carry on with my computer and anything else. I didn’t want to spend the money but I’m so glad I did. Buy it. They need to make it in many colors.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack but does not stand on the floor.
customer_reviews.text: Great, handy, comfy, cute, but does not stand flat on the ground -- topples over when set on the floor; even against something, you have to set it just right, or it will fall forward. Otherwise, very pleased with this backpack! Perfect size, great compartments, and super stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Nadya

customer_reviews.title: Three stars because of the buttons. Another reviewer had ...
customer_reviews.text: Three stars because of the buttons. Another reviewer had mentioned that the buttons were not the same as the picture. They are padded fabric buttons. Remind me of a few business suits I had in the 90's with large padded buttons. I was looking for a lightweight, feminine, professional backpack for work travel. Will return this one.
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: its a good looking backpack
customer_reviews.text: its a good looking backpack. allows you to be a bit more fashionable or unique than standard utility backpacks. i wish the water container pockets on the side were a bit larger. I dont really get the "made for women" shoulder straps. it has enough compartments to be organized but enough space to be more free form. I dont like backpacks that have 200 compartments. this was a good medium of both space and organizational pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie H.

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS BACKPACK.
customer_reviews.text: I get lots of compliments and it is very light weight. The shoulder straps are small. I am a very petite person so it is perfect for me. Also, I can really pack many things in it. Love the front pocket for easy reach for phone and keys.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Egan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is the best, most ergonomic comfortable and useful backpack I've ever had. it distributes the weight in a way that it does not hurt my back, and the front doesn't hurt my breasts, as is designed for the female body. Is big enough that averything fits and is comfortable but not huge that would make me look like a turtle. I has an inner pocket for my tablet, laptop, folders, notebooks, and even lipstick. Everything inside, once organized in the right pocket, is very safe from damage of friction or shock. It is also water resistant. High quality that really lasts long so is a great investment, plus is very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Overall good buy
customer_reviews.text: Modern updates to a classic backpack style. The color is fantastic and goes with everything. I bought this bag to be my carry-on for a trip to Europe. It’s size is great for essentials and fits under the airplane seat. Downsides are that each of the three compartments are very narrow. Good for many small items but even trying to fit a sweatshirt was difficult. The buttons are cute, but after just a week of use, one is already falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, not the fit.
customer_reviews.text: I want to love the bag and give it 5 stars because I love the colors and it's well made but I find the shoulder straps to be a little uncomfortable and set kind of wide. I'm 5'9"
customer_reviews.author: Mel Jones

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this work bag. It's stylish and durable. I've been using it for about 8 months now and it's held up extremely well. The tablet sleeve easily fits by iPad and my slim keyboard and the additional pockets are perfect for business cards and pens. I really like that the laptop plug can be folded up into it's on area and still leaves enough storage space for folders and files. I carried it fully packed quite a few times while traveling between buildings and still find the bag very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle J

customer_reviews.title: I Love Mine, but...
customer_reviews.text: I love mine, but I wish it were just slightly larger and that the side pockets that are normally used to put drink bottles in, were longer to hold longer bottles!
customer_reviews.author: P. R. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: The three pockets are also very nice. I was unsure if my laptop was going ...
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was what I needed when I started making a long commute with a lot of walking. I am a very petite person and have issues with backpacks being too big but this fits well. The three pockets are also very nice. I was unsure if my laptop was going to fit in the specified pocket because it was right on the edge of what was recommended but it fits fine as long as the backpack isn't extremely full of other things. I like the extra little pocket for the charger as well. The other pockets are spacious and the interior is nice.
customer_reviews.author: KitCat

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! It is so hard to find a functional backpack that is actually CUTE, and not like every other one. This one is actually purse-like in its detailing, color, and interior. Not only that, it's super comfy to carry and the straps/backside that faces you are very padded. I got the red backpack and the color is exactly as pictured. I can see me using this well into grad school!!
customer_reviews.author: britmar12

customer_reviews.title: Cute backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love this back pack so much! I got it in the dark grey color. I love the outside with the buttons. It's like a separate compartment on the outside. I also like the multicolored polka dots on the inside of the backpack. Sure it may not be professional looking on the inside, but hey....neither am I :) This is a really cute and girly backpack! It's a little expensive but I know it's worth it because it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Been using this to haul my laptop to and from work for the past 2.5 months, it is holding up really well. Holds everything I need (I toss my purse crap in it too, one less thing to carry). It is cute and holds what I need, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Ceranic

customer_reviews.title: Fee to return
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack! Came with a missing button. No option for a trade in; we would have had to return and order a new one and pay shipping to return it. So I used a heavy duty decoractive pin in place of the missing button and it works fabulously. Lots of storage space, the technology wire pocket is a great feature! The side pockets are a bit tight, will fit a 16 oz water bottle or smaller. Anything else slides out.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Great style, but at the low price the quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Buttons began to fall apart and straps began to tear apart @2 months. Submitting for warranty @4 months. Great style, but at the low price the quality was not there. It was not heavily packed with books. Going to spend big bucks (>$100) for a more durable bag for law student wife.
customer_reviews.author: sRobot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling! So many pockets!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is my go-to for traveling. It works as a great "personal bag" on airplanes. It fits perfectly under the seat. I hate it when my bags get unorganized and I can't find anything, but that doesn't happen with this backpack! There is a pocket for EVERYTHING! I love that all of my necessities each have their own spot in this backpack. The polka-dot liner is also a super cute bonus :) I have a 13" macbook air and it fits in the laptop pocket with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This back pack is AMAZING! Beautiful color, silky inside, tons of pockets and storage... only 2 downsides are thin straps that need more padding and the way the area for the laptop is designed at the bottom of the bag. There is a weird foam(??) block at the bottom of it which I assume is to add more protection. I would definetly purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Cute but could be a little bigger
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has worked out well for my busy schedule of working full time and taking night classes. It has held up well on my daily commute and looks cuter than the typical backpack. I will say that it doesn't fit nearly as much stuff as I would like, however I carry A LOT with me: laptop, textbooks, lunch, shoes etc. I give it 4 stars since it's not as roomy as I would like it to be. Once it's full of stuff, it's hard to squeeze a water bottle into the side pocket.
customer_reviews.author: rm16

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to carry heavy loads AND pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted a nice laptop bag that wasn't black and wasn't a single-strap, and this bag is absolutely perfect! I have been using it for quite some time now, and I have absolutely nothing but positive things to say about it. It's pretty, it has compartments in the most helpful of places to really stuff the bag if need be, and it is comfortable! The back is memory-foam ish, the straps are thick, and even totally full with computer and books, feels lightweight. The only thing that could make it better is if it had a strap to clip around the waist, but otherwise, it is my favorite Amazon purchase ever.
customer_reviews.author: Cindythedreamer

customer_reviews.title: I love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. The quality is superb, though I ended up needing to return as my 17" laptop did not fit....even after removing the padding at the bottom. I could zip it but it was obvious that the zipper was being pushed to its limits :( I have an HP Envy Touchscreen, I saw others asking about this computer and would it fit...No. It will not.
customer_reviews.author: Jen C.

customer_reviews.title: Buttons aren't durable.
customer_reviews.text: I like the colors, cute backpack. But I literally got into my car today, and sat my bag down in my seat and a button popped off. I have used it for maybe two or three days tops. The first day, another button popped off. If you're actually using the bag, I don't think the buttons are going to get along with you very well. But cute bag if you aren't doing much.
customer_reviews.author: AshLeigh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my work commute
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my work commute, looks business professional and cute, not too girly, not too big and bulky, able to carry my lunch, heels, makeup bag, and laptop. Smaller compartments for my keys, lip balm, wallet, headphones and phone as well. The flap inbetween the laptop compartment and the rest of the backpack on the inside is VERY thin though, no padding. Just one thin layer of the 'plastic' inside lining.
customer_reviews.author: iHeartAmazon

customer_reviews.title: ... for almost 2 years now and it looks as good as the day I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I have had this backpack for almost 2 years now and it looks as good as the day I bought it. I use it daily to carry my laptop for work and weekends when we travel. I love all the pockets and space for organization. The front open pocket is a great place to items you want quick access to.
customer_reviews.author: K. Leech

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: The backpack came exactly how it shows in the photo. I love it! It doesn't have a lot of room inside the backpack, but it does have a lot of pockets. I am able to fit a tablet, laptop, a binder and a couple of other small items, which works for me because it'll help keep me from over-packing. I use it for work and I love the way it feels on my back.
customer_reviews.author: S.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller framed people!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! I'm 5 feet tall and about 120 pounds, so I needed a bag that didn't look or fit too big, this bag is perfect. I am able to fit everything I need into this backpack and wear it comfortably. I have also received several compliments! I believe the quality and detail is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Leah M. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: finally! a pack that isn't too big! it's super cute, the laptop compartment has a protective foam base, it has zippered compartments, durably constructed, and carries a good amount of stuff (not too big, not too small).
customer_reviews.author: chromodynamica

customer_reviews.title: I have been searching for a WHILE for the perfect tech bag but I'm a small framed woman and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a WHILE for the perfect tech bag but I'm a small framed woman and al the bags were either too heavy or way too masculine. It was hard to find a backpack that was fashionable yet reliable for the storage of multiple devices. I cannot stop telling people how much I love this bag, the attention to detail is remarkable!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: I love ogio bags since there are high quality stuff that ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid women's backpack. My wife uses it for work every day and fits her laptop and all the other random stuff she cramps in. I love ogio bags since there are high quality stuff that is usually cheaper than the rest of the high end bags.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Best part about this bag is it's very stylish
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for work as I have a long commute each day. Straps are comfy and it fits my laptop perfectly. Plenty of other pockets for tablets, kindles, notebooks, etc. Best part about this bag is it's very stylish. It doesn't look like a little kid's backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: You are going to love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten a lot of compliments on my backpack. I can fit my laptop ipad mini iphone pencil bag cosmetic bag and a large heavy book plus a 16 oz water bottle. The color is great too because it doesn't easily get dirty. The straps are really comfortable and fit me really well. The only thing I would improve on is how the bag sits on the ground or chair etc. it tends to fall if not supported by something which is a minor flaw I am willing to let go off because of this backpack's good looks and carrying potential.
customer_reviews.author: TIbarra

customer_reviews.title: Cute & professional
customer_reviews.text: Best backpack ever! Holds so many items including laptop & charger and still feels light. Bonus: looks professional & cute!
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I'm loving this backpack! I bought it for college, and so far, it functions well for my specific needs. I can fit everything I need for my classes, and I've gotten compliments on how nice it looks. It is also very comfortable for a backpack. My neck and shoulders don't hurt after carrying it around all day across campus. The only thing I'm not crazy about is that it is not water resistant. I will update this review at the end of the semester to let you know how it holds out.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Shrestha

customer_reviews.title: Super cute & girly especially because it has buttons
customer_reviews.text: Super cute & girly especially because it has buttons! Waterproof! Durable material! The straps are great for my back. One of the best items I bought from Amazon! (= I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ana I. Saucedo

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! I wanted a backpack that was strong and funtional but still feminine and proffessional for work. It is sturdy and has many pockets which is exactly what I needed. It even has special pockets for your tablets and ereaders. I purchased the wine colored bag and the actual color is a lot lighter than the picture indicates. I don't mind because the color is still very beautiful. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love my new backpack! It's shocking how much I can fit inside. I no longer have to bring my backpack AND my purse to school! My MacBook Air feels totally secure. Also, the backpack has been designed in such a way that even if I'm carrying a lot, it doesn't feel that way on my back! I'm carrying more but it FEELS like I'm carrying less since using this backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive, but not well made
customer_reviews.text: I loved the professional, sleek look of this bag, which I use for work. I was disappointed that it didn’t hold up well —- one button fell off and the metal “label” fell off. Understand, this bag wasn’t tossed around on a school bus or thrown into a locker. I took it to my office every day. Big disappointment. Expected more of OGIO
customer_reviews.author: AIR

customer_reviews.title: Cheeky tailoring-still professional looking as laptop bag or daybag
customer_reviews.text: My high school forensics student loves this professional, but chic laptop backpack for competitions. Not large enough capacity for school books bag-but perfect as a laptop or daybag. The buttoned up detail is even cuter than images show. btw- Color is dark gray, not black, so the contrast buttons pop. Not used everyday, but is showing no wear after more than 2 years of travel. :) Comfortable padding w/o bulk.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jarrard

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I love this pack! It's the perfect size to hold my laptop, files, and needed accessories. It's not too big so it prevents you from carrying stuff you don't need. I love the two side pockets for water bottles. It's a great color and shape. It's well made and I love that it's gender specific.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: So comfy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to wear, lots of room, two cup holders, and super cute!
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful color, and it fits everything I need. So far, it has been very sturdy and reliable, and seems as though it will last for a long time :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this brand. Love it! The padded straps and back are amazing! Would buy again. The color is devine!
customer_reviews.author: Bakke

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this backpack. It is lightweight, great organization, easy to access items, feminine and cute. I have been looking for a backpack that fit these criteria and finally found one. If I was being extremely picky, I would say there are two things missing. One is a clip for keys. Another would be a sleeve on the back to slide over a luggage handle. Other than those minor things, it is a fabulous bag.
customer_reviews.author: lfish

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and stylish. Using for college can fit a large textbook, a few notebooks, and my large planner as well as pens/pencils, etc. Laptop sleeve fits my computer well.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Fits most 17" laptops but not a 16.5"
customer_reviews.text: Well color is great the bag is pretty but I purchased this for my work bag to easily tote my stuff back and forth primarily my laptop. Well I went to put my laptop that I measured as 16.5 in and it didnt fit, pulled out the padded bottom still didnt fit. I am so frustrated that this wont work for what I need
customer_reviews.author: l. smith

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but not for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.text: The sleeves are not padded at all. The compartments are smaller than I expected. The blue is a great color, though!
customer_reviews.author: imaginaryMisfit

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack! It feels great on my shoulders even when it's full. Have traveled with it twice for work and it's easy to get into to remove my laptop at the airport and fits quite a bit of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: This bag is pricey for buttons to just be popping off!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag. The color is a bit deeper wine that I thought, but I have gotten compliments on it. However, I’ve had it for about a month, and I only wear it to carry my laptop to and from work about 3x a week and I just realized a button has fallen off! I paid a lot of money for a button to come off that easily. I checked out the website and one of their features is “endurance”, not so much with this bag! I would recommend this bag but make sure you have some superglue for the buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Sybil

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack, chevron inside is neat
customer_reviews.text: Nice backpack, chevron inside is neat. 4 stars because there's not much padding in the straps making uncomfortable to carry. Walking through the airport I had to take off several times because the straps were hurting my shoulders. Overall, I like the style and functionality of the backpack.
customer_reviews.author: j87snort1

customer_reviews.title: Roomy but not bulky
customer_reviews.text: I really love this laptop! Every zipper compartment is double zippered which is great. There are lots of small pockets inside the first one to hold pens, pencils, calculators, cards, etc. The laptop sleeve is padded, sturdy and large enough for my 17 inch laptop. One of the big things I was worried about before I ordered was that it would look bulky. I really didn't want a laptop backpack that LOOKED like a laptop backpack, so if you are looking for something similar, this is perfect for you. Even with my laptop in, I can fit three 1in binders and my charging cords, ipad, pens, pencils, a calculator and a water bottle. Awesome, awesome backpack
customer_reviews.author: Brittnye

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bag. It's cute, sturdy, comfortable, fits and protects my 15.7 inch laptop perfectly. I love the different pockets. The only downfall for me is that I cannot get a bottle of water to fit in either side pocket, so I just use those for ID's and my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Carrisa Smith

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack 3 years ago when I started my PhD. I still love it, still using it daily, its a very tough little backpack, super comfortable, still looks amazing, has millions of really convenient pockets and I love all the laptop protection padding.
customer_reviews.author: Water28

customer_reviews.title: Nice pack
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife for her Australian trip coming up. She loves this pack and is lookingI forward to using it on her 2wk jaunt to the land down under
customer_reviews.author: BryceCanyon

customer_reviews.title: Fits everything I need without being bulky
customer_reviews.text: So this backpack is a little girly for my taste, but it has tons of compartments for me to tuck things away in. I have to carry extra supplies for my insulin pump. It has room for files if necessary, my purse and my large laptop. The bottle holders on the side could use some elastic on the top because my water bottles fall out all the time. But other than that, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: averageJane

customer_reviews.title: This bag has been perfect for me as an adult learner
customer_reviews.text: This bag has been perfect for me as an adult learner. It is stylish, fits my laptop perfectly, and still has a ton of room for books and more.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Loveday

customer_reviews.title: stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: The bag is very stylish, i receive a lot of comments. I wish the interior of the middle pocket (where notebooks and papers go) was slightly larger. The front zip pocket is spacious.
customer_reviews.author: PCB

customer_reviews.title: Too small, try a different Ogio style
customer_reviews.text: Too small! Returned it, went to target and bought a different Ogio for less money and. Love it. My new one is light weight and better protective material. Felt like the cloth on this one would not protect my tech. Not roomy enough for computers and tablets.
customer_reviews.author: DeenaS

customer_reviews.title: OGIO Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this backpack. I was looking for a slim backpack because I don't carry much besides the laptop and its charging brick. This is slim, but does hold a 17" laptop (not a skinny Macbook, either). I hope it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Kimisan

customer_reviews.title: The bag received does not have the same metallic buttons ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag received does not have the same metallic buttons as shown on the website image. The buttons are covered with cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet for school, but I was definitely pleased when it arrived at my door. The interior is a bright color, so it's easy to find everything you need. I also love the two side holders for water bottles, etc. It is a backpack for an organized person - all of the compartments have suggestions on how to use it to maximize the backpack.
customer_reviews.author: APW

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome backpack! You can't go wrong with Ogio
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome backpack! You can't go wrong with Ogio, especially when it comes to organization. Product arrived in perfect condition and has separate compartment for my laptop and charger, another for books or clothes, and another for smaller personal items, wallet, and makeup! I got my first OGIO bag my first year of college and fur years later after everyday use it still looks great! Bought this one because I loved the style. :)
customer_reviews.author: VanChar

customer_reviews.title: I guess I'll be buying her a different one for school and keeping this since it is a very nice bag just on the small side
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is carrying her binder :( it doesn't fit a 1 1/2" binder ... I guess I'll be buying her a different one for school and keeping this since it is a very nice bag just on the small side . It would probably be a nice weekend bag ..
customer_reviews.author: Alex hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Functional, and Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is great! I have a large 17" laptop and had a very difficult time finding a backpack or tote that would fit it. It fits perfectly in this. The laptop compartment on this backpack is padded and has a place to put your power cord (which I thought was super handy). The other pockets are very spacious and help keep everything organized. This backpack is also super cute and very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Josh & Lacey

customer_reviews.title: So nice!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is so nice! The quality is outstanding and everywhere I go, I get compliments. The fabric is kind of like felt, very durable and doesn't show dirt easy. Super, happy, extra bonus is the memory foam back and straps. Can you marry a back pack?
customer_reviews.author: PeachSneers

customer_reviews.title: Function meets fashion!
customer_reviews.text: Love love Love this backpack. Comfortable to wear and great storage. I get lots of compliments and great for toting to the office!
customer_reviews.author: Traceyb

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BACK PACK took it to Europe as my ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS BACK PACK took it to Europe as my "purse" lots of pockets, and places for every thing from my tablet to munches, pocket on the side for a water bottle, its well made fully lined and just beautiful, i love the fabric its sorta of a canvas/linen very classy looking and the buttons are a nice detail, that actually unbutton if you want them too, my daughter tried to steal it from me, said it was perfect for those weekend getaways ... I bought her her one ! We have the blue one which is a bright royal blue very pretty, the red is more crimson like an autumn red my daughter loves her red one
customer_reviews.author: QueenMaude

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in Terra color, so that it's not too bright and casual for work, and it's not too formal or stuffy for casual occasions. It's perfect! Lightweight, not too big (I'm petite) and the compartments and pockets are very well-placed and of good size. I like the colorful dots on the lining--- makes me smile when I open the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Joyax

customer_reviews.title: Use everyday.
customer_reviews.text: Use it for work everyday. Holds all my work essentials.
customer_reviews.author: C Huetter

customer_reviews.title: happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag. I really do... The contrast of the hot pink interior against the Felt exterior is super cool and it worked for my travel needs. But I don't feel right carrying it in the summer. I feel like its a winter bag... something to think about.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely MA

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, yet Professional, and functional
customer_reviews.text: Still use this daily to bring my laptop back and forth to work. I’ve gotten lots of compliments on it. It’s super cute, yet professional.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Larson

product_meta.title: OGIO International Soho Pack
product_meta.description:
Dedicated padded laptop compartment fits most 15 inch laptops. Fully adjustable women's specific shoulder straps. Large main compartment fits books, binders, and extra files. 

Meet the Soho Women's Laptop Backpack. Endless pockets provide a place for your laptop, tablet, books, binders, files, cords, and so much more. The front pocket even has a place for the smaller stuff like your cellphone, gum, pencils, makeup and more. Plus, it looks great. The custom metal trim add a subtle but fierce accent to this backpack's clean design. The quilted back panel flaunts elegance while the interior adds a burst of color contrast. If you need a bag that lets you show off your style and can always keep up with your on-the-go lifestyle, the OGIO Soho women's Laptop Backpack is the bag for the job. Dedicated 15” laptop pocket with separated tablet sleeve for reliable protection Padded iPad/tablet/e-reader pocket Fully adjustable women’s specific shoulder straps Large main compartment fits books, binders, and extra files Quilted back panel Fully padded base protects laptop Cord storage pocket Separate file compartment sleeve Two fleece lined side stash pockets Front slip pocket Fully featured organization panel with zippered stash pocket Padded grab handle Materials: 1T/CD 900D

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
